seo.title: Contact The Corner House Cambridge | Bookings, Directions & Opening Hours
seo.description: Call +44 1223 921122 or email cornerhouse@lapeninns.com for bookings, cabins, and takeaway. Find us at 231 Newmarket Road, Cambridge CB5 8JE (opposite Cambridge Retail Park).

location.title: Location

items.text: Heated garden cabins & covered beer garden
Takeaway & delivery via Uber Eats, Deliveroo, Just Eat
Limited on-site parking; retail park parking opposite
